Koba

Live exemples

Backbone model

HTML:

1<script type='text/html' id='tmpl-demo-model'>
2    <p>First name: <input data-bind='value: firstName, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
3    <p>Last name: <input data-bind='value: lastName, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
4    <h2>Hello, <span data-bind='text: firstName() + " " + lastName()'></span>!</h2>
5</script>
6<div id='content-demo-model' class='demo'></div>

Javascript:

 1var Person = Backbone.Model.extend({
 2    defaults: {
 3        firstName: "",
 4        lastName: ""
 5    }
 6});
 7var person = new Person({
 8    firstName: "John",
 9    lastName: "Smith"
10});
11var MyView = koba.View.extend({
12    el: "#content-demo-model",
13    render: function() {
14        this.$el.html("<div id='my-view' data-bind='template: {name: \"tmpl-demo-model\"}'></div>");
15        myView.bindData();
16    }
17});
18var myView = new MyView({data: person});
19myView.render();

Backbone model & collection

HTML:

 1<script type='text/html' id='tmpl-demo-collection'>
 2    <div data-bind="foreach: todos">
 3        <p><input data-bind='value: val, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /> <span data-bind='text: val()'></span></p>
 4    </div>
 5    <div>
 6        <form><input data-bind='value: todo.val' /> <button id='add' type='submit'>Add</button></form>
 7    </div>
 8</script>
 9<div id='content-demo-collection' class='demo'></div>

Javascript:

 1var Todo = Backbone.Model.extend({
 2    defaults: {val: ""}
 3});
 4var Todos = Backbone.Collection.extend({model: Todo});
 5var todos = new Todos([
 6    {val: "Try Koba"},
 7    {val: "Read Knockout documentation"}
 8]);
 9var todo = new Todo();
10var data = {todo: todo, todos: todos};
11var MyView = koba.View.extend({
12    events: {"submit form": "add"},
13    el: "#content-demo-collection",
14    render: function() {
15        this.$el.html("<div data-bind='template: {name: \"tmpl-demo-collection\"}'></div>");
16        myView.bindData();
17    },
18    add: function(e) {
19        e.preventDefault()
20        todos.add(this.data.todo.toJSON());
21        this.data.todo.clear();
22    }
23});
24var myView = new MyView({data: data});
25myView.render();

Backbone nested model and collection

HTML:

 1<script type='text/html' id='tmpl-demo-nested'>
 2    <p>First name: <input data-bind='value: firstName, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
 3    <p>Last name: <input data-bind='value: lastName, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
 4    <h2><span data-bind='text: firstName() + " " + lastName()'></h2>
 5    <p style='padding-left: 1rem;'>Address:</p>
 6    <p style='padding-left: 3rem;'><input data-bind='value: address.number, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /> <input data-bind='value: address.street, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
 7    <p style='padding-left: 3rem;'><input data-bind='value: address.zipCode, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /> <input data-bind='value: address.city, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
 8    <h2><span data-bind='text: address.number() + " " + address.street() + " " + address.zipCode() + " " + address.city()'></span></h2>
 9    <p style='padding-left: 1rem;'>Phones:</p>
10    <div data-bind="foreach: phones">
11        <p style='padding-left: 3rem;'><input data-bind='value: number, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /> <span data-bind='text: number()'></span></p>
12    </div>
13</script>
14<div id='content-demo-nested' class='demo'></div>

Javascript:

 1var Address = Backbone.Model.extend({
 2    defaults: {
 3        number: "",
 4        street: "",
 5        zipCode: "",
 6        city: ""
 7    }
 8});
 9var Phone = Backbone.Model.extend({
10    defaults: {
11        number: ""
12    }
13});
14var Phones = Backbone.Collection.extend({model: Phone});
15var Person = Backbone.Model.extend({
16    defaults: {
17        firstName: "",
18        lastName: "",
19        address: new Address(),
20        phones: new Phones()
21    }
22});
23var person = new Person({
24    firstName: "John",
25    lastName: "Smith",
26    address: new Address({
27        number: "41",
28        street: "rue de la République",
29        zipCode: "69002",
30        city: "Lyon"
31    }),
32    phones: new Phones([
33        {number: "12345678"},
34        {number: "87654321"}
35    ])
36});
37var MyView = koba.View.extend({
38    el: "#content-demo-nested",
39    render: function() {
40        this.$el.html("<div data-bind='template: {name: \"tmpl-demo-nested\"}'></div>");
41        myView.bindData();
42    }
43});
44var myView = new MyView({data: person});
45myView.render();
